landing.greetingMsg: Welcome to Catena-X - The Automotive Network
landing.heading1: Please finish the following application form to complete the registration of your company for Catena-X
landing.point1: The registration form consists of 5 steps and will take approximately 5-10 minutes of your time
landing.point2: To finish the registration in one run, we propose to ensure that you have the commercial register form of your company handy. If you dont have the form, you can invite the right person in your company to support the registration and upload the form.
landing.point3: You can pause the registration at any time. Re-connect to your registration status by using the login data which you received via e-mail.
landing.footerText1: More information can get found in the

registration.subHeading: Please finish the company onboarding by finishing the following tasks to join Catena-X - Automotive Network Portal.
registration.regiStep: Register to Catena-X by entering all information requested in the following 5 steps
registration.regiSubHeading: Please finish the company onboarding by finishing the following tasks to actively participate and use all functions in the Catena-X Automotive Network Portal.

registrationStepOne.verifyCompayDataSubHeading: Please add below your legal entity company data. For a quick and easy data entering, use your company BPN Number to automatically retrieve all necessary information. If you dont have the BPN, you can use the legal entity nam as well or your enter the company data manually.
registrationStepOne.seachDatabase: Search for your company data by BPN or Company Name to autofill the relevant data fields
registrationStepOne.bpnInvalidError: This is not a valid BPN, please enter a valid BPN or use the manual flow below.
registrationStepOne.bpnNotExistError: This BPN doesn't exist, please enter a valid BPN or use the manual flow below.

finish.greetingMsg: Congratulations! Your registration has been successfully submitted!
finish.point1: You, as well as added Legal Managers, will receive a e-mail with all the details of your registration form
finish.point2: We will validate your registration request. As soon as your registration is approved (usually within 2 working days), you will receive a e-mail confirmation
finish.point3: As soon as you received the confirmation e-mail, you will be able to connect to the portal and procceed with the technical onboarding

companyRole.title: The role of your company
companyRole.subTitle: Please select one or more roles for your company to participant in Catena-X. The company role can always get updated/changed later. Depending on the selected role, the offered portal services might differ.
companyRole.role1: The role of the 'Active participant' is relevant if you want to:
companyRole.role1li1: provide and /or consume business data (e.g. parts master data)
companyRole.role1li2: use the offered portal business applications
companyRole.role2: The role of the 'App Provider' is relevant if you want to:
companyRole.role2li1: provide apps/services within the Catena-X ecosystem
companyRole.role3: The role of the 'App Provider' is relevant if you:
companyRole.role3li1: provide operations and /or infrastructure services within the Catena-X network
companyRole.TermsAndCond: Please check and agree to the items listed below:
companyRole.NoRolesError1: An error occured. No roles found.
companyRole.NoRolesError: An error occured. No roles found. Please {{ retry }} or contact the system administrator.

documentUpload.title: Upload documents
documentUpload.subTitle: Please upload your legal company commercial register document.
documentUpload.dragDropMessage: Drag and drop files here, or click to select files
documentUpload.dragDropErrorMessage: Document not uploaded, only pdf documents are allowed with a maximum size of 8MB

Responsibility.subTitle: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts.
Responsibility.emailErrorMessage: Please enter a valid email address
Responsibility.hint: Optional message in the invitation e-mail. Lorem Ipsum
Responsibility.userInviteSubHeading: No users defined, please use the form below to add users:

ErrorMessage.401: User role load failed. Please contact your administrator.
ErrorMessage.403: User role load failed. Please contact your administrator.
ErrorMessage.404: Service error. Please contact your administrator.
ErrorMessage.405: Method not supported. Please contact your administrator.
ErrorMessage.409: Service error. Please contact your administrator.
ErrorMessage.415: Service error. Please contact your administrator.
ErrorMessage.500: This Page isn't working. Server Error.
ErrorMessage.error1: Registration form cant get submitted, since company data are missing. Please fill out all company data in Step 1.
ErrorMessage.error2: Registration form cant get submitted. CX Terms and Conditions need to get accepted. Please accept the Terms and Conditions under Step 3 to proceed.
ErrorMessage.error3: Registration form cant get submitted. Please upload your company document under Step 4.

FooterContent.Footer1: Please enter all the required information before proceeding.

registrationClosed.heading1: Your registration has already been submitted and closed. We are now reviewing the application.
registrationClosed.heading2: As soon as this is finished you will receive an email with the access to the Catena-X Portal.
